login.title: Gateway login
login.gateway_description: The hosname or IP address of the gateway, you should can check your internet router to find this.
login.username_description: The username you use to login to the gateway. Usually this is `admin`.
login.password_description: The password you use to login to the gateway. This password is mentioned on the back of your gateway device.

device_select.title: Select your gateway type
device_select.v1: This is the first Intergas gateway, colored red. This was typically paired with a Honeywell round thermostat and introduced in 2017.
device_select.v2: This is the current Intergas gateway, colored black.
